page2.content: Peer-reviewed . Bauville, A., & Yamato, P., 2020, Pressure-to-depth conversion models for metamorphic rocks: derivation and applications, Geochemistry, Geophysics, Geosystems. M., 2020, Control of 3-D tectonic inheritance on fold-and-thrust belts: insights from 3-D numerical models and application to the Helvetic nappe system, Solid Earth. DOI: 10.5194/se-11-999-2020 .
